name: Carrot Fries
description: 4 large carrots,sprinkle of sea salt. Preheat oven to 450F, and spray baking sheet with non-stick cooking spray.Slice carrots into french-fry shapes, and place on baking sheet.Sprinkle sea salt over fries.Bake for 12 minutes. Enjoy!

name: Tomato Stew egg
description: Wash the tomatoes and dig a hole; Beat the eggs into a bowl, add some salt and stir; Pour the egg liquid into the tomatoes; Cover the tomato lid; Add water to the pot, boil, and put the tomatoes on the steaming rack; Close the lid; Take it out when steamed; Cut some green onions and sprinkle on the custard. Finally, you get home cooking tomato stew.
